Forest Retreat: If all beaches disappeared, I would head to a serene forest retreat for relaxation. The calming atmosphere and gentle rustling of leaves would provide a soothing escape from the hustle and bustle of daily life. Imagine lying on a soft bed of moss, surrounded by towering trees, listening to the gentle chirping of birds and the gentle breeze rustling through the leaves. The forest would offer a peaceful and rejuvenating environment, allowing me to unwind and recharge.

Mountain Oasis: In the absence of beaches, I would seek out a mountain oasis for relaxation. The cool, crisp air and breathtaking views from the mountaintop would provide a refreshing change of scenery. Imagine sitting on a rocky outcropping, sipping tea and watching the sunset behind a range of towering peaks. The sound of a nearby stream and the scent of pine trees would create a tranquil atmosphere, allowing me to let go of stress and worries.

Hot Spring Haven: If all beaches disappeared, I would look for a hot spring haven to relax. The warm, bubbling water would provide a comforting embrace, soothing my muscles and melting away tension. Imagine soaking in a natural hot spring, surrounded by towering trees and lush greenery. The sound of the waterfall and the warmth of the water would create a sense of tranquility, allowing me to unwind and rejuvenate.

Desert Oasis: In a world without beaches, I would seek out a desert oasis for relaxation. The vast expanse of sand dunes and endless blue sky would provide a dramatic and peaceful backdrop. Imagine lying on a sand dune, watching the sunset and listening to the howling of sand dunes. The warmth of the sun on my skin and the cool breeze blowing across the dunes would create a sense of calm and serenity, allowing me to escape from the stresses of daily life.
